nynoaa%>%
  mutate(hover_text=str_c( "Year : ", year, '\nMonth:', month)) %>%
  filter(snow < 100, snow > 0, year>2000) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~ tmax, y = ~ tmin, type = "scatter", mode = "marker",color = ~snow,
          text = ~ hover_text, alpha = 0.5)
